n,w=map(int,input().split())
a=list(map(int,input().split()))
if sum(a)>w or sum(a)<-w or sum(a)+w<0 or sum(a)-w>0 or sum(a)==0:
    print(0)
else:
    print(w-abs(sum(a)))


n, w = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

i = 0
j = 0

for i in range(n):
    if a[i] > w or a[i] < -w:
        print(0)
        break
    j += a[i]
    if j > w or j < -w:
        print(0)
        break

if i == n-1:
    print(w-j+1)

if sum(a)>w or sum(a)<-w or sum(a)+w<0 or sum(a)-w>0:
    print(0)
else:
    print(w-abs(sum(a)))

n, w = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
j = a[0]

for i in range(n):
    if a[i] > w or a[i] < 0:
        print(0)
        break
    j += a[i]
    if j > w:
        print(0)
        break

if i == n - 1:
    print(w-j+1)

n, w = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
if sum(a) > w or sum(a) < -w or sum(a) + w < 0 or sum(a) - w > 0:
    print(0)  # nop
else:  # nop
    print(w - abs(sum(a)))

n, w = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

i = 0
j = 0

for i in range(n):
    if a[i] > w or a[i] < -w or j > w or j < 0:
        print(0)
        break
    j += a[i]

if i == n-1:
    print(w-j+1)
